availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel W. Lovell (Farmer in Laurel County)

body.p: Lovell was born on April 11, 1822 in North Carolina. He later moved to Laurel County, Kentucky where he worked as a Farmer in the 1850's and 1860. He died on March 30, 1889 in Kentucky.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, "Daniel Webster Lovill (April 11, 1822 - March 30, 1889)," Memorial #74289707, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=74289707&ref=acom (accessed June 22, 2017); Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Laurel, p. 2B; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Laurel, p. 0.
